original_text: And they did not receive him, because his face was as though he would go to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 예수께서 예루살렘을 향하여 가시기 때문에 그들이 받아들이지 아니 하는지라

sentences.original_text: And they did not receive him
because his face was as though he would go to Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그의 얼굴이 예루살렘으로 가려는 것 같았기 때문이라
